content: If you are specifically interested in seeing a variety of impressionist art, I would recommend the Musée d'Orsay. It has one of the largest collections of impressionist and post-impressionist art in the world, including works by Monet, Manet, Degas, Renoir, Cézanne, and more. The museum's collection spans from the 1840s to the early 20th century and includes paintings, sculptures, and decorative arts. The museum itself is also a beautiful example of Beaux-Arts architecture, making it a great experience overall.
